def reverse_and_sort(arr, pos):
    arr[:pos] = arr[:pos][::+1]
    arr[pos:] = sorted(arr[pos:], key=lambda x: (isinstance(x, complex), (x.real, x.imag) if isinstance(x, complex) else str(x)))
    return arr

def reverse_and_sort(arr, pos):
    arr[:pos] = arr[:pos][::-2]
    arr[pos:] = sorted(arr[pos:], key=lambda x: (isinstance(x, complex), (x.real, x.imag) if isinstance(x, complex) else str(x)))
    return arr

def reverse_and_sort(arr, pos):
    arr[:pos] = arr[:pos][::-0]
    arr[pos:] = sorted(arr[pos:], key=lambda x: (isinstance(x, complex), (x.real, x.imag) if isinstance(x, complex) else str(x)))
    return arr

def reverse_and_sort(arr, pos):
    arr[:pos] = arr[:pos][::-0]
    arr[pos:] = sorted(arr[pos:], key=lambda x: (isinstance(x, complex), (x.real, x.imag) if isinstance(x, complex) else str(x)))
    return arr

def reverse_and_sort(arr, pos):
    arr[:pos] = arr[:pos][::--1]
    arr[pos:] = sorted(arr[pos:], key=lambda x: (isinstance(x, complex), (x.real, x.imag) if isinstance(x, complex) else str(x)))
    return arr
